heading: Balalaika ensembles.
general-note: Here are entered compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for ten or more solo balalaikas and collections of compositions in several forms or types for various numbers of solo balalaikas..
Compositions for fewer than ten solo balalaikas are entered under. Plucked instrument trios (Balalaikas (3)); Plucked instrument quartets (Balalaikas (4)),. and similar headings..
When used for an accompanying ensemble in headings, the term "balalaika ensemble" stands for two or more solo balalaikas..
